Intervention: Determination of estrogen levels in blood samples of patients treated with triptorelin and tamoxifen for 5 years.
Determination of estrogen levels in blood samples of patients treated with triptorelin plus exemestane for 5 years.
Eligibility: A resected breast cancer confirmed histologically
- Simultaneous registration in clinical trial IBCSG-2402 (SOFT trial) required
- randomised to receive triptorelin in combination with tamoxifen citrate or exemestane
Positive oestrogen receptor and/or progesterone tumour
Results: The levels of estrogen (Estradiol [E2], Estrone [E1] and estrone sulphate [E1S]) at different times during the first 4 years of treatment with triptorelin (Trip) in combination with tamoxifen (T) or exemestane (E), IBCSG 24-02 SOFT-EST Sub-study

The estrogen concentrations (estradiol [E2], estrone [E1] and estrone sulphate [E1S]) were measured at the following times for TSE-SOFT: 0 (baseline), 3, 6, 12, 18, 24, 36 and 48 months after randomization.
Title of the arm/group : Triptorelin Plus Tamoxifen
Description arm/group: Determination of estrogen levels in blood samples of patients treated with triptorelin and tamoxifen for 5 years.
Unit of measurement: estradiol levels (E2) pg/mL at baseline (0 months): 26 participants
Level of estradiol (E2) at 3 months: 25 participants
• Level of estradiol (E2) at 24 months: 15 participants
• Estrone rate (E1) at base (0 months): 26 participants
Estrone sulphate (E1S) at base (0 months): 26 participants
· Estrone sulphate levels (E1S) at 3 months: 25 participants
• Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 6 months: 24 participants
Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 12 months: 21 participants
Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 18 months: 20 participants
• Estrone sulphate levels (E1S) at 24 months: 14 participants
Estrone sulphate levels (E1S) at 36 months: 14 participants
• Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 48 months: 13 participants
Title of the arm/group: Triptorelin Plus Exemestane
Description arm/group: Determination of estrogen levels in blood samples of patients treated with triptorelin plus exemestane for 5 years.
Unit of measurement: estradiol levels (E2) pg/mL at baseline (0 months): 81 participants
Level of estradiol (E2) at 3 months: 67 participants
Level of estradiol (E2) at 24 months: 62 participants
Level of estradiol (E2) at 36 months: 60 participants
• Estrone levels (E1) at base (0 months): 81 participants
Estrone sulphate (E1S) at base (0 months): 81 participants
• Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 3 months: 67 participants
Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 6 months: 66 participants
Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 12 months: 68 participants
• Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 18 months: 64 participants
• Estrone sulphate levels (E1S) at 24 months: 59 participants
Estrone sulphate levels (E1S) at 36 months: 60 participants
Estrone sulphate level (E1S) at 48 months: 46 participants
